messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Junk -- valuable or annoying??
messages.msgSnippet: I don t know if someone s already said this, but I just saw a commercial for Junkyard Wars - is on TLC monday nights at 8:00. ... From: marbleface@aol.com
messages.messageBody:
I don't know if someone's already said this, but I just saw a commercial for Junkyard Wars - is on TLC monday nights at 8:00.
-----Original Message-----
From: marbleface@... [mailto:marbleface@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 14, 2001 8:15 AM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Junk -- valuable or annoying??

In a message dated 02/14/2001 8:49:49 AM !!!First Boot!!!,
insomniaaks@... writes:


No! I've never heard of it! What is it??? I'm
enthralled! tell me, tell me now!
It sounds lovely so far.




Junkyard Wars -- it is on sporadically around here on a station called TLC.  
There is another one about battling robots called BattleBots -- that one is
on Comedy Central here.  

Have fun!

Nance (thinking maybe there are more of "them" than there are of "us" --
hmmm...)
